mapper.select: SELECT ,AB.f_name AS t_address_block, ac.f_name as t_address_city, ap.f_name as t_address_province, pc.f_name as propertyCompanyName FROM t_group_building GB INNER JOIN t_address_block AB ON AB.f_id = GB.t_block_f_id AND AB.f_sys0_del_state = 0 inner join t_address_city ac on ac.f_id = AB.t_city_f_id and ac.f_sys0_del_state = 0 inner join t_address_province ap on ap.f_id = ac.t_province_f_id and ap.f_sys0_del_state = 0 inner join t_property_company pc on pc.f_id = GB.t_property_company_f_id WHERE 1=1 AND GB.f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND GB.f_check_status=1 AND GB.f_sign_status=1

SELECT DISTINCT AB.f_name AS t_address_block, ac.f_name AS t_address_city, ap.f_name AS t_address_province, AB.f_id AS blockId FROM t_group_building GB INNER JOIN t_address_block AB ON AB.f_id = GB.t_block_f_id AND AB.f_sys0_del_state = 0 inner join t_address_city ac on ac.f_id = AB.t_city_f_id and ac.f_sys0_del_state = 0 inner join t_address_province ap on ap.f_id = ac.t_province_f_id and ap.f_sys0_del_state = 0 inner join t_property_company pc on pc.f_id = GB.t_property_company_f_id WHERE 1=1 AND GB.f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND GB.f_check_status=1 AND GB.f_sign_status=1
